details.description: Contact details to make a claim, get advice and report a change of circumstance in your household - phone and textphone numbers, opening hours
details.body:
Make a claim, get advice and report a change of circumstances in your household.

You should get your Winter Fuel Payment automatically.

Winter Fuel Payment helpline

Enquiry form
Telephone: 08459 15 15 15
Textphone: 0845 601 5613
Calling from outside the UK: +44 (0)191 218 7777
Monday to Friday, 8am to 5:30pm

If you’ve claimed before

You can also contact the local office paying your Winter Fuel Payment. You’ll find their details on any letters they sent you.
